com.google.android.exoplayer.parser.mp4

Class Track

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.parser.mp4.Track

  • public final class Track
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates information describing an MP4 track.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int id
      The track identifier.
      MediaFormat mediaFormat
      The format if type is TYPE_VIDEO or TYPE_AUDIO.
      TrackEncryptionBox[] sampleDescriptionEncryptionBoxes
      Track encryption boxes for the different track sample descriptions.
      long timescale
      The track timescale, defined as the number of time units that pass in one second.
      int type
      One of TYPE_VIDEO, TYPE_AUDIO, TYPE_HINT and TYPE_META.
      static int TYPE_AUDIO
      Type of an audio track.
      static int TYPE_HINT
      Type of a hint track.
      static int TYPE_META
      Type of a meta track.
      static int TYPE_VIDEO
      Type of a video track.

      • id

        public final int id
        The track identifier.

      • type

        public final int type
        One of TYPE_VIDEO, TYPE_AUDIO, TYPE_HINT and TYPE_META.

      • timescale

        public final long timescale
        The track timescale, defined as the number of time units that pass in one second.

      • mediaFormat

        public final MediaFormat mediaFormat
        The format if type is TYPE_VIDEO or TYPE_AUDIO. Null otherwise.

      • sampleDescriptionEncryptionBoxes

        public final TrackEncryptionBox[] sampleDescriptionEncryptionBoxes
        Track encryption boxes for the different track sample descriptions. Entries may be null.
